text:
 Convolutional neural networks and long short-term memory networks, and perhaps both
together, are best suited to learning features from raw sensor data and predicting the
associated movement.
Let’s get started.
21.1 Overview
This tutorial is divided into ﬁve parts; they are:
1. Human Activity Recognition
2. Beneﬁts of Neural Network Modeling
3. Supervised Learning Data Representation
4. Convolutional Neural Network Models
5. Recurrent Neural Network Models
